title: Hanging cape

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Hanging cape is an unused scenery object that can be found in the game cache. Originally, the cape could be seen on the top floor of the Wise Old Man's house hanging above the stairs.

content:
This article contains information obtained from the game APIs or cache.
The content may not be currently accessible in game, or may be reserved for use in a future update.
Hanging cape
Released6 June 2005 (Update)
Removal23 August 2005 (Update)
MembersNo
QuestNo
LocationNone
OptionsNone
ExamineA cape from Saradomin, suitable for a battle-mage.
Advanced data
Object ID7101

The Hanging cape is an unused scenery object that can be found in the game cache. Originally, the cape could be seen on the top floor of the Wise Old Man's house hanging above the stairs.

Following the Draynor Bank Robbery, the Wise Old Man's house was redecorated, and he now wears a Saradomin cape. While the original version of his house can be seen in the cutscene of the bank robbery, and when talking to Miss Schism, the cape cannot be seen as he is wearing it during the robbery.

As a result, the Hanging cape has never been present in Old School RuneScape, although it remains in the game files.

The Wise Old Man's appearance while his cape was hanging upstairs.

The '''Hanging cape''' is an unused scenery object that can be found in the game cache. Originally, the cape could be seen on the top floor of the [[Wise Old Man]]'s house hanging above the stairs. 

Following the [[Draynor Bank Robbery]], the Wise Old Man's house was redecorated, and he now wears a [[Saradomin cape]]. While the original version of his house can be seen in the cutscene of the bank robbery, and when talking to [[Miss Schism]], the cape cannot be seen as he is wearing it during the robbery. 

As a result, the Hanging cape has never been present in ''Old School RuneScape'', although it remains in the game files.

[[File:Wise Old Man (mortarboard).png|thumb|left|120px|The Wise Old Man's appearance while his cape was hanging upstairs.]]
